title: Severe Weather Emergency Protocol - Wakefield District
body:
Due to severe weather conditions, additional emergency accommodation and support services are now available in Wakefield District.

Emergency Accommodation

  • Emergency shelter spaces available at several locations across the area
  • No appointment necessary - walk-in service available
  • Hot meals and warm drinks provided
  • Safe, warm environment for all adults experiencing homelessness

Support Services

  • Outreach teams operating extended hours
  • Additional support workers available at key locations
  • Emergency clothing and supplies available
  • Connection to ongoing support services

How to Access Support

If you need emergency accommodation during this period:

  • Contact the emergency helpline: 0800 123 4567
  • Visit drop-in centres which remain open extended hours
  • Speak to outreach workers operating in the area

If you see someone sleeping rough during this period, please contact StreetLink or call the emergency services if there is immediate danger.
shortMessage: Emergency accommodation and services are available due to severe weather conditions.
